description:
Kenshin`s combined Heaven Dipper Sacred Yin Fist and Divine Fist of the North Star ultimate technique swallows up Kenshiro.
"This is the final blow... My history begins now!!"
"Then I`ll place the wishes of my pengyou in this blow...!!"
When two evenly-matched powerhouses battle one another, the Death Omen Star shines above both their heads. Destined by the North Star to kill one another, how will Kenshiro and Kenshin`s battle end--?! Kenshiro`s final battle is coming to a close!!
Source: crunchyroll
